perks.name: Bloody Mess
perks.description: More violent death animations. +5% damage to all weapons.
perks.flavor: You leave a trail of carnage wherever you go.

perks.name: Iron Lung
perks.description: Radiation resistance +15%. Better breathing in contaminated areas.
perks.flavor: Your lungs are adapted to the wasteland air.

perks.name: Scavenger
perks.description: +20% chance to find extra loot when scavenging.
perks.flavor: You have a knack for finding the good stuff.

perks.name: Road Warrior
perks.description: Move 25% faster on the world map.

perks.name: Caps Collector
perks.flavor: Every cap counts in the wasteland.

perks.name: Locksmith
perks.description: Unlock containers of all difficulty levels.
perks.flavor: No lock can keep you out.

perks.name: Science!
perks.description: Hack terminals and craft advanced tech.

perks.name: Ghoul Whisperer
perks.description: Ghouls are less hostile. +10% XP from ghoul encounters.
perks.flavor: You understand the smoothskins... and the not-so-smooth.

perks.name: Fortune Finder
perks.flavor: Caps just seem to find their way to you.

traits.name: Vault Dweller
traits.description: +1 INT, -1 END. You spent your life underground.
traits.flavor: The vault raised you, for better or worse.

traits.name: Wasteland Survivor
traits.description: +1 END, +1 A, -1 C. Born in the wastes.

traits.name: Tech Specialist
traits.description: +2 INT, -1 S, -1 P. You prefer machines to people.

traits.name: Born Fighter
traits.description: +2 S, -1 INT, -1 C. Strength over smarts.
traits.flavor: You solve problems with your fists.
